author: Jyllands-Posten
title: Ground News - At a table in his living room Lykketoft delivers a startling message: This is why Israel is losing the war — and this is how Denmark should react
text:
Summary by Jyllands-Posten If one does not understand how extreme Benjamin Netanyahu and his government are, one does not understand the Israel-Palestine conflict at all, according to Mogens Lykketoft. Now he tells why Israel is in the process of losing the war and inflicting enormous damage on the West. And explains how the road to peace involves Denmark. Share menu More
